description:
He's back and his name is Rey Gold. He's quite the popular stud, and we're proud to have the opportunity to have him back on our set. He's a bit older and more refined now, but still the same charming, young guy that we've become accustomed to.

He was in the area on summer break when we offered to film him again. Since, deep down inside, he's an exhibitionist; Rey couldn't refuse another chance to show the world what he's got.

Facts

1.Occupation: Gym Manager

2.Sexual orientation: Straight

3.Favorite position: Doggy

4.Astrological sign: Leo

5.Age you lost your Virginity: 15

6.Biggest Turn on: Fitness

7.Biggest Turn off: Unhealthy habits

8.Biggest Celebrity Crush: Paris Hilton

9.Favorite food: BBQ'd chicken

10.Best physical feature: Everything

Stats

1.Age: 22

2.Cock Length: 7.5'

3.Cock Girth: 6'

4.Cut or Uncut: Cut

5.Home state: CA

6.Height: 5'9''

7.Weight: 170

8.Shoe Size: 11

9.Waist size: 32
title: Rey Gold
